panels.description: The average number of records in each request per topic, select pod to see details.
panels.title: Consumer Records / Request

panels.description: The total number of fetch requests.
panels.title: Consumer Total Requests

panels.description: The total number of failed authentications for this consumer (sum of failures on all client IDs)
panels.title: Consumer Failed Auth

panels.description: The average number of records in each request, select pod to see details.
panels.title: Producer Records / Request

panels.description: The total number of fetch requests.
panels.title: Producer Total Requests

panels.description: The total number of connections with failed auth
panels.title: Producer Failed Auth

panels.description: Producer error per topic,  select a pod to view details
panels.title: Producer Error Rate by Topic

panels.description: Choose Pod to see rebalancing rate. High rebalancing rate is a potential perf problem.
panels.title: Rebalancing Failure Rate Per Hour

panels.description: Choose Pod to see rebalancing rate. High rebalancing rate is a potential perf problem.
panels.title: Rebalancing Success Rate Per Hour

panels.description: Lag is the delta between the last produced message and the last committed message of a partition. In other words, lag indicates how far behind your application is in processing up-to-date information.
panels.title: Partitions Assigned Per Consumer

panels.description: Lag is the delta between the last produced message and the last committed message of a partition. In other words, lag indicates how far behind your application is in processing up-to-date information.
panels.title: Kafka Partition Average Lag

panels.description: The rate of Kafka consumer requests per minute
panels.title: Kafka Consumer Requests Per Minute Rate

panels.description: The rate of Kafka consumer requests per minute
panels.title: Kafka Consumer Responses Per Minute Rate

panels.description: The average number of records consumed per second for a topic.
panels.title: Kafka Records Consumed/Min Rate

panels.description: The number of fetch requests per second.
panels.title: Kafka Consumer Fetch Requests/Min Rate

panels.description: The max time taken for any fetch request.
panels.title: Kafka Consumer Fetch Latency Max

panels.description: The average time taken for a fetch request.
panels.title: Kafka Consumer Fetch Latency Avg

panels.description: The average time taken by a Kafka producer node to complete a request to a broker. A high value for this metric can indicate potential issues with network or broker performance, while a low value can indicate that the system is operating efficiently.
panels.title: Average Latecy
